title: Can I take an Arabic course if teacher uses pictures of animate beings in video? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Ariz from UK Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa'laykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh can I buy and take an online pre-recorded Arabic course if the teacher uses material with pictures of animate beings and do I have to edit the video? He uses pictures of what? Animate beings. Animal beings? Animals? Yeah, no problem with that at all. This is totally permissible InshaAllah.
